Name: Malecon Cocktail
Ingredients: 50 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
10 ml Lustau Oloroso Don Nuño Sherry
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of large ice cube/ball or chunk or block ice.
Use tongs to place large ice cube/ball or chunk or block ice in cocktail.
Review: Best described as a fortified wine-rich Daiquiri .
History: Created in 2011 by Erik Lorincz at , London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Malecon Cocktail contains 192 calories
